verses.text: \w My|strong="H1732"\w* God, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* God, \w why|strong="H5921"\w* hast thou forsaken \w me|strong="H5921"\w*? \add Why art thou so\add* \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* helping \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \add and from\add* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* words \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* groaning?

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* God, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* cry \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5800"\w* daytime, \w but|strong="H5800"\w* \w thou|strong="H4100"\w* answerest not; \w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5800"\w* night season, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* am not silent.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w thou|strong="H7121"\w* art holy, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* inhabitest \w the|strong="H7121"\w* praises \w of|strong="H7121"\w* Israel.

\w Our|strong="H3478"\w* fathers trusted \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w thee|strong="H8416"\w*: \w They|strong="H3478"\w* trusted, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w thou|strong="H3427"\w* didst deliver \w them|strong="H3427"\w*.
They cried unto thee, and were \w delivered|strong="H6403"\w*: They trusted in thee, and were not put to shame.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* worm, \w and|strong="H2199"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* man; \w A|strong="H3068"\w* reproach \w of|strong="H3808"\w* men, \w and|strong="H2199"\w* despised \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.

All \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* see \w me|strong="H2781"\w* laugh \w me|strong="H2781"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w scorn|strong="H2781"\w*: \w They|strong="H3808"\w* shoot \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* lip, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* shake \w the|strong="H3808"\w* head, \add saying\add*,

Commit \add thyself\add* \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; let \w him|strong="H7200"\w* deliver \w him|strong="H7200"\w*: Let \w him|strong="H7200"\w* rescue \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* delighteth \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w art|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w out|strong="H5337"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* womb; \w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* didst \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w* trust \add when I was\add* upon \w my|strong="H3068"\w* mother’s breasts.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* was cast \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* womb; \w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* art \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mother bare \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Be not \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* trouble is \w near|strong="H5921"\w*; \w For|strong="H5921"\w* there is none \w to|strong="H5921"\w* help.
Many bulls \w have|strong="H3588"\w* compassed \w me|strong="H4480"\w*; Strong bulls \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Bashan \w have|strong="H3588"\w* beset \w me|strong="H4480"\w* round.

They gape upon \w me|strong="H5437"\w* \w with|strong="H6499"\w* \w their|strong="H5437"\w* mouth, \add As\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ravening \w and|strong="H6499"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* roaring lion.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* am poured \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* water, \w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bones \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* joint: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* wax; \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* melted \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w strength|strong="H6106"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* dried \w up|strong="H8210"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* potsherd; \w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* tongue cleaveth \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* jaws; \w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* hast \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dust \w of|strong="H4325"\w* death.

\w For|strong="H6083"\w* dogs \w have|strong="H4194"\w* compassed \w me|strong="H8239"\w*: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* company \w of|strong="H4194"\w* evil-doers \w have|strong="H4194"\w* inclosed \w me|strong="H8239"\w*; \w They|strong="H3581"\w* pierced \w my|strong="H3581"\w* hands \w and|strong="H6083"\w* \w my|strong="H3581"\w* feet.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H7272"\w* count \w all|strong="H5437"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bones. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* look \w and|strong="H3027"\w* stare \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5437"\w*;

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w part|strong="H1992"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* garments \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* vesture \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* cast lots.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w be|strong="H3830"\w* \w not|strong="H5307"\w* thou \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* thou \w my|strong="H5921"\w* succor, haste thee \w to|strong="H5921"\w* help \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

Deliver \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sword, \w My|strong="H3068"\w* darling \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* power \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dog.

\w Save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* lion’s \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*; Yea, \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* horns \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* wild-oxen \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* hast answered \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

I \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w declare|strong="H6030"\w* \w thy|strong="H3467"\w* name \w unto|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* brethren: \w In|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* midst \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* assembly \w will|strong="H6310"\w* I praise \w thee|strong="H6030"\w*.

Ye \w that|strong="H6951"\w* fear \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w him|strong="H8034"\w*; All ye \w the|strong="H8432"\w* seed \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H5608"\w*, glorify \w him|strong="H8034"\w*; \w And|strong="H8034"\w* stand \w in|strong="H8432"\w* awe \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w him|strong="H8034"\w*, all ye \w the|strong="H8432"\w* seed \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Israel.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3373"\w* despised \w nor|strong="H4480"\w* abhorred \w the|strong="H3605"\w* affliction \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* afflicted; \w Neither|strong="H4480"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hid \w his|strong="H3605"\w* face \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*; \w But|strong="H3513"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w cried|strong="H3478"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* heard.

\w Of|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w* cometh \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w great|strong="H6440"\w* assembly: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w pay|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* vows \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3373"\w* meek \w shall|strong="H5088"\w* eat \w and|strong="H8416"\w* \w be|strong="H5088"\w* satisfied; They \w shall|strong="H5088"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H7227"\w* seek after \w him|strong="H5048"\w*: Let \w your|strong="H7999"\w* heart live \w for|strong="H7227"\w* ever.

\w All|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ends \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* remember \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H3824"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* kindreds \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* nations \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* worship \w before|strong="H2421"\w* thee.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*’s; \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ruler \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fat ones \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w and|strong="H3068"\w* worship: \w All|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dust \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* bow before \w him|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Even|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* cannot keep \w his|strong="H3068"\w* soul alive.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* seed \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w serve|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*; \w It|strong="H3381"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* told \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \add next\add* generation.

\w They|strong="H5608"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* come \w and|strong="H5647"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* \w his|strong="H5647"\w* righteousness \w Unto|strong="H2233"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* people \w that|strong="H1755"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w be|strong="H5647"\w* born, \w that|strong="H1755"\w* \w he|strong="H2233"\w* hath \w done|strong="H5647"\w* it.
